Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 97th overall pick, by Baltimore in 2010...
Traded from Baltimore to Los Angeles (A) on 4/1/2010 (Going to LAA: P A. Reed, 1B W. Brown. Going to BAL: 2B M. Oloughlin)...
Injured on 8/15/2013 with a Bruised Heel, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 9/2/2013, off Jeff Niemann (SEA)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/17/2013, off Ross Detwiler (TOR)...
Hit 3 homeruns against Seattle, driving in 5 runs on 10/8/2013...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/2014, hitting .500 with 5 HR, 13 RBI...
Hit 3 homeruns against Oakland, driving in 4 runs on 6/9/2014...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/2014, hitting .346 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2014, hitting .322 with 12 HR, 29 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (A) on 7/13/2014...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 2014, hitting .251 with 41 HR, 122 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (A) on 4/12/2015...
Drove in 7 runs against Seattle on 4/25/2015...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2015, hitting .341 with 11 HR, 28 RBI...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Won Most Valuable Player Award in 2015, hitting .310 with 49 HR, 136 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/6/2016, hitting .393 with 5 HR, 11 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (A) on 6/19/2017...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2017, hitting .280 with 10 HR, 28 RBI...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Minnesota, driving in 4 runs on 5/7/2018...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Toronto on 7/25/2018...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Toronto on 7/26/2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/30/2018, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 15 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Toronto on 6/4/2019...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Detroit on 9/21/2019...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Boston, driving in 5 runs on 8/29/2021...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/13/2022, hitting .526 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2022, hitting .381 with 12 HR, 32 RBI...
Won World Championship with Los Angeles (A) in 2022...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
